#Text=Severna Park
#Text=Severna Park is a town in Anne Arundel County .
#Text=Understand
#Text=This town is located in central Maryland , located near the Major City of Baltimore .
#Text=It is a suburban town with plenty of retail resources and one of the better public school systems in the state .
#Text=By car
#Text=From the north

#Text=There are quite a few ways to get into Severna Park but the most commonly used route involves taking an exit off of I-97 which will bring you to Ritchie Highway road , one of the more central roads in Severna Park .
#Text=From the South

#Text=You will most likely find yourself traveling on I-95 until you pass through the Washington D.C. area , then you 'll want to take the US-50 exit towards Annapolis and then the same exit leading to Ritchie Highway
#Text=By air
#Text=The Airport closest to Severna Park , is the Baltimore Washington International Airport .
#Text=It is located about 25 minutes away from Severna Park , assuming there is no major traffic .
#Text=Most airports will have direct flights to BWI as it is a major airport .
#Text=You can also fly into the Washington Dulles International Airport located near southern D.C. and close to Virginia .
#Text=It is a little over an hours time away from Severna Park , but is most likely your destination if you are traveling Internationally .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Because the town is so small , the best and most effective way to get around town is by car .
#Text=There are also buses that circulate through the town .
#Text=Also , in the summer when the weather is nice you can get most places in town by walking to them .
#Text=Do
#Text=Kinder Park -
#Text=This public park offers free use during the day for anyone who wants to play any type of sporting event or just spend a nice day in the park .
#Text=Kinder park is also home to the local Boy Scout meeting halls and to other local events throughout the year .
#Text=B&B Bike Trail -
#Text=This trail runs throughout the entire town and can be followed all the way through to Annapolis , MD .
#Text=There are many stops along the way with benches if you need to rest , and the trail lets off at some of the more commercial parts of town .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Marley Station Shopping Mall
#Text=7900 Ritchie Highway -
#Text=Marley Station is a medium sized retail mall that can be found on the outskirts of Severna Park .
#Text=It contains over 100 in-store shops , as well as a few restaurants and a movie theater .
#Text=There is ample parking located all around the mall and there are three main department stores that help make up the mall .
#Text=( JcPenny , Sears , Macy 's ) .
#Text=Ritchie Highway Shopping Plaza -
#Text=This shopping plaza includes over 20 family owned businesses that offer a variety of services from shoes , to salons and boutiques , and more .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Bill Bateman 's Bistro ( Best Buffalo Wings in town ! )
#Text=566 Gov. Ritchie Highway -
#Text=This family style restaurant is located in one of the towns most central shopping plazas .
#Text=It offers great service , delicious food , and some of the best buffalo wings you 'll probably ever have .
#Text=Bateman 's has won numerous awards for their Buffalo wing recipes .
#Text=There is ample parking and a decently sized menu .
#Text=There is also a bar in the middle of the restaurant and many television sets tuned to sports games throughout the place .
#Text=Kyoto Steakhouse
#Text=568 Ritchie Highway -
#Text=If you are a fan of Japanese cuisine with a western steakhouse mixture than this place is for you .
#Text=There are two styles of seating .
#Text=You can sit in an old fashioned Japanese style lounge , or you can get one of the tables that have a grill right on them .
#Text=It is a great place to have a fun meal and see your food get cooked right in front of your eyes .
#Text=Romilos Pizzeria 478A Ritchie Highway -
#Text=This old fashioned Greek pizzeria has been a local favorite for over 15 years .
#Text=There is a large dinning area and also a plentiful takeout menu that includes pizza , pasta , wings , and other traditional Greek dishes .
#Text=It is the perfect place for Friday night dinners .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=While there are no hotels or motels in Severna Park
#Text=there are plenty that are within a few minutes from the town .
#Text=Valencia Motel & Efficiencies 10131 Washington Blvd N , Laurel , MD 20723 -
#Text=Offers cable TV , double sized beds , free parking , hot showers , and accepts most major credit cards .
